duties_responsibilities.duty: Help create an industry-leading vision for UX content in autonomous experiences.
Designing content for immersive UX across app and voice interfaces.
Partner with product designers to craft integrated end-to-end experiences.
Work with cross-functional partners to present a consistent voice across communication channels.
Develop, maintain, and socialize content design styles and standards.
Promote content design at Cruise and in the broader design community.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, User Experience Design, or a related field (Master's preferred)
